about_the_game:
*This game requires a VR headset and controller.
*Please start playing this game from the steam screen after starting steamVR.

In Silver World, players take on the role of being transported to another world and defeat silver enemies that attack them in a VR experience.

Major features:

Immersive VR experience: VR technology allows you to deeply immerse yourself in the game world and directly experience the tension of approaching enemies and the excitement of battle.

Realistic Combat: Enjoy realistic gun feedback and grabbing objects.

Tense action: Enemies attack from various directions. Experience gameplay that requires quick reactions.

Put on your VR headset and dive in!

Method of operation:

Right controller stick operation: Snap turn

Left controller stick operation: Move

Left controller menu button: Display menu

Grip button: grab something

Trigger button: Shoot the gun *No bullet limit

*If the menu position is shifted at the start, please reset the steamVR position before starting the game.
